content.description: Thin and delicate face climbing on superb quality rock.  This was the first bolted line at Tatooine.  Classic!
content.protection: 5 bolts with a fixed draw on the third bolt. 2 bolt anchor
content.location: On the west wall of the Inner Council (look for the fixed draw on the third bolt). Rappell Down.

content.description:
I believe this is already in the guidebook, so feel free to update the Route Name.

From base of trash compactor, instead of following crack up to the right(Trash Compactor), follow tunnel on left side. Stem up about 30 ft, there are two options for exit.

Option 1: Requires a tight squeeze, exits to top of Trash Compactor.

Option 2: We opted to traverse over the open chimney to a nice belay platform

Watch out for loose blocks !
content.protection: Doubles in #1s and #2s, #3, #4, a finger cam or two for anchor may be helpful
content.location: Within the Inner Sanctum, enter portal right of Yoda, left of Padewan. Enter chimney with parallel walls, scramble up chockstone. The tunnel straight ahead is your route.

content.description:
Inside of a tunnel lies a two perfectly parralel slabs of rock at ~75 degrees that creates a chimney slab climb WITH the aid of a crack running up it to protect.

Once you reach daylight, climb left over a boulder with the help of a crack to reach a gear anchor.

Plan on leading/following out. Walk off below Earth in Upheaval or rap Padewon Saber
content.protection: Single Rack to 3". Alpine sling to backup anchor on top on chicken head.
content.location:
Within the Inner Sanctum, search you will for a tunnel entrance right of Yoda and just left of Padawon Saber.

Enter the tunnel scramble over a chockstone and veer left into the compactor, a long parallel walled shaft about 40 feet deep. Scramble up until to reach the crack on the right that will be your only hope getting out.

content.description: Thin crux is near the start, the step across can be a little heady, the roof move is exciting, and there might even be a sting in the tail too. Nice route with a variety of moves.
content.location: Just outside of the inner council on the left side. Starts 20 feet to the left of Yoda, on the other side of the boulder.

content.description:
Start on a boulder on the north wall of the

Inner Council

.  Clip a couple bolts and transfer to the west wall.  Continue up to a two-bolt anchor.
Climb a thin, intermittent seam/crack. Three fixed pins can be used to supplement the gear.
content.location:
On the right side of the west wall of

Inner Council

.

content.description:
Start off a boulder opposite Yoda. Sustained climbing leads past 3 bolts. Don't miss this route when in the Inner

S

anctum
content.location: Starts off a boulder opposite Yoda

content.description:
A crimpy, techy route.  Start on the east face of the

Inner Council

.
content.location:
Located on the east face of the

Inner Council

.
